# LegibilityWeight.regular

**Case**

Use regular font weight (no Accessibility Bold).

## Declaration

```swift
case regular
```

## Getting weights

- **LegibilityWeight.bold**: Use heavier font weight (force Accessibility Bold).

items.description: Use heavier font weight (force Accessibility Bold).
